definition: loose/slack/(fig.) to soften (policies, tone of voice)/to give some slack/(of a place) not crowded
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The right peddle of your bicycle has come loose; you'd better fix it.
sentences.chinese: 你的自行车右脚踏板松动了，最好修一修。

sentences.english: This is because sold the axis and the bushing part appears became less crowded causes.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为销轴和衬套部分出现了松动所导致的。

sentences.english: Conclusion Arthrolysis can improve the effect on scapulohumeral periarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 结论关节松动术可以提高肩周炎患者的临床疗效。

sentences.english: He rubbed the cramped hand against his trousers and tried to gentle the fingers.
sentences.chinese: 他把那只抽筋的手在裤子上擦擦，想使手指松动松动。

sentences.english: He rubbed the cramped hand against his trousers and tried to gentle the fingers.

sentences.english: Check for looseness in front and headset bearings.
sentences.chinese: 检查松动在前面的耳机轴承。

sentences.english: Release the cap with hand in counterclockwise direction.
sentences.chinese: 用手朝逆时针方向松动盖子。

sentences.english: Will you nail down that loose board in the floor?
sentences.chinese: 请你把那块松动的地板钉牢好吗？

sentences.english: Dedicated to after the aluminum foil sealing, to tight the loosen lid again.
sentences.chinese: 专用于铝箔封口后，再次给松动的盖子旋紧。

sentences.english: The row seat frame adopting the structure has the advantages of firm connection and low probability of looseness.
sentences.chinese: 采用该结构的排椅椅架，连接稳固，不易松动。

sentences.english: The next day, restrictions were eased across much of Europe and flights began.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，欧洲大部分的飞行限制松动，飞机开始通航。

sentences.english: I have got a loose tooth.
The king's heart of exclusion softened somewhat.
sentences.chinese: 文王排斥之心开始有些松动。

sentences.english: Loosen oil pan bolts and remove the front bolt at each side.
sentences.chinese: 松动油底壳螺栓，拆下每一面的前螺栓。

sentences.english: Forward right wing to body fairing has several loose screws.
sentences.chinese: 右大翼机身整流罩前部有几颗螺钉松动。

sentences.english: As he turns it over, he discovers that one end is loose.
sentences.chinese: 他将念珠翻过来看时，发现其中一端松动了。
